titleStmt.title: Here is an item for you. Or, The countrimans bill of charges, for his comming vp to London declared by a whistle. To the tune of King Henry, &c.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and date of publication from STC.
In two parts, each with woodcuts at head; part 2 has caption: The country-mans going downe into the country, declared by a whistle.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
